title: Ticket #7179: condor_annex should use TOKEN auth
description:
Now that we have (#7100) per-submitter flocking, condor_annex should support a collector-in-the-cloud approach to extending an existing pool for a specific user (as a specific user, with no additional infrastructure).

(Conversely, with #6951, the collector in the cloud would become unnecessary. This assumes inbound connectivity on the local collector, however, which may be a mistake. It also assumes that the local user has the privilege to advertise startds to the local collector; this is probably true, but certainly doesn't need to be.)
